# YouTube Idea + Thumbnail Generator

Gemini (for text ideas) + SD-Turbo (fast thumbnails, local).

*Instructions:* Add your GOOGLE_API_KEY in Kaggle Secrets (or set as env var) before running the Gemini cells. Images are generated locally using stabilityai/sd-turbo (no image API key needed).

# CELL 2 - Setup Gemini (text generation)
import os
from kaggle_secrets import UserSecretsClient
import google.generativeai as genai

GOOGLE_API_KEY = UserSecretsClient().get_secret("GOOGLE_API_KEY")
if not GOOGLE_API_KEY:
    raise ValueError("‚ùå GOOGLE_API_KEY is missing in Kaggle Secrets!")

genai.configure(api_key=GOOGLE_API_KEY)
text_model = genai.GenerativeModel("gemini-2.0-flash-lite")

# CELL 3 - Get YouTube Ideas
def get_yt_ideas():
    topic = input("Enter your main topic: ")
    prompt = f"Give 5 unique, clickable YouTube video ideas for the topic: {topic}. Make them simple, short, and beginner-friendly."
    try:
        ideas = text_model.generate_content(prompt).text.strip()
        print("
üéØ Generated Ideas:
", ideas)
        return ideas
    except Exception as e:
        print("‚ùå Error generating ideas:", e)

ideas = get_yt_ideas()

# CELL 4 - Load SD-Turbo (fast model)
import torch
from diffusers import StableDiffusionPipeline, DPMSolverMultistepScheduler

pipe = StableDiffusionPipeline.from_pretrained(
    "stabilityai/sd-turbo",
    torch_dtype=torch.float32
)
pipe.scheduler = DPMSolverMultistepScheduler.from_config(pipe.scheduler.config)
pipe = pipe.to("cpu")

# CELL 5 - Thumbnail Generator (fast)
def generate_thumbnail(idea, description):
    prompt = f"YouTube thumbnail design: Bright vibrant colors, Big bold text, Modern clean layout, Suitable emojis (üî•‚ú®üìö‚öôÔ∏èüí°), Eye-catching style. Title/Idea: {idea}. Description: {description}"
    print("
üé® Generating thumbnail‚Ä¶ (fast) ...")
    image = pipe(prompt).images[0]
    print("‚úÖ Thumbnail Ready!")
    return image

# CELL 6 - Ask User & Generate Thumbnail
chosen_idea = input("
Enter the idea you want to create a thumbnail for: ")
description = input("Enter the description for the thumbnail: ")
thumbnail = generate_thumbnail(chosen_idea, description)
thumbnail
